original_title: Remembering: Clearing Space (Part 1 of Balinese Trilogy)
overview: "At one level, Lee's title creates a pun on the film's organizing principles, re-membering, as the filmmaker dismembers and recombines elements of the image and soundtracks. But the Balinese source material of REMEMBERINGL CLEARING SPACE is not merely a fortuitous opportunity to explore fundamental qualities of the film medium. Rather, Lee attempts to inscribe into the film's form qualities of Balinese performance and dance." â€“William
title: Remembering: Clearing Space (Part 1 of Balinese Trilogy)
